# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for responding to pausing or resumption of animation.

## Declaration

```swift
weak var delegate: (any UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The methods for a dynamic animator delegate are described in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate].

## Responding to animation changes

- **UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate**: To respond to the pausing or resumption of UIKit dynamic animation, configure a custom class to adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicAnimatorDelegate] protocol. Then, in a dynamic animator (an instance of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDynamicAnimator] class), set the delegate to be an instance of your custom class.
